name: The Atrocity Exhibit / Iron Witch split 7"
description:
Iron Witch - Her Cheating Heart 6:42
The Atrocity Exhibit - Throne Of Bile 6:02

Iron Witch, the reigning kings of UK sludge, team up with the magnificently bearded grindcore/sludge berserkers The Atrocity Exhibit for this 7" split of pure audio carnage. 1 track each, both 6 minutes long, both designed to make your brain leak out through your nostrils such is the sheer force of the music contained within these grooves. The Atrocity Exhibit swerve the use of blistering speed sometimes shown in their past work and instead spit out the snail-paced 'Throne Of Bile', a masterclass in tension-filled suffering; a track rippling with a violent, unpredictable swagger that's constantly threatening to explode in your face. Iron Witch offer no respite, with 'Her Cheating Heart'  being perhaps their best song yet; a track of such colossal heaviness and down-tuned, down-beat, forceful depression that's it's like having your face forced down into the muck that lines the banks of the Mersey. With both bands on such rampantly aggressive form, this is without a doubt the ugliest 7" to crawl its way out of the UK this year.

Iron Witch track was recorded by Bri and Devo Doom at the 1in12 Studio, Bradford, in September 2013

The Atrocity Exhibit track was recorded, mixed and mastered by Ian Boult at Stuck On A Name Studios, Nottingham, in July 2012

A joint release between Dead Chemists and Witch Hunter Records, this split 7" is limited to 500 copies, on none more black vinyl, and comes with a 4 panel gatefold sleeve, with artwork & layout by James Caygill

** THIS IS A PRE-ORDER AND WILL SHIP AS SOON AS WE GET THE RECORDS BACK FROM THE PRESSING PLANT, WHICH SHOULD HOPEFULLY BE IN A FEW WEEKS. YOUR PATIENCE IS APPRECIATED **

name: Bundle Launch Deal
description: A bundle of our new self-titled 10 song CD EP, the Catheter split 7", and a t-shirt for a discounted price.

name: The Atrocity Exhibit EP
description:
Brand new release! CD in a jewel case, with full colour artwork, 4 page booklet with lyrics. Available from us or from WOOAAARGH in Germany. Limited to 100 copies as we'll be re-issuing this on vinyl very soon!

1. An Expression Of Human Weakness (0:43)
2. God Shines On Fools (0:50)
3. Slave To The Mind (2:03)
4. The Possibility Of Life's Destruction (Discharge) (0:51)
5. The Value Of Nothing (1:03)
6. The Sleep Of Reason (1:22)
7. 3 Songs (Death On A Stale Bed / Corpsehanger / Weakener (2:53)
8. Violent World (The Misfits)

name: The Atrocity Exhibit / Catheter split 7"
description:
Brand new release! After being cursed with delays our split with US grind stalwarts Catheter is finally available, made possible thanks to Bones Brigade (France), Circus Of The Macabre (UK), Wooaaargh (Germany), Dead Chemists (UK), Fear me! (UK), Pie 'N' Mosh (UK), and Killing Art (Czech).

Tracks:
A1. The Atrocity Exhibit - Plague Mask Replica
A2. The Atrocity Exhibit - Civil War (Motorhead)
B1. Catheter - Landscape In Wake
B2. Catheter - Thermonuclear Devastation (Onslaught)

Black vinyl with full colour 4 page sleeve.

name: Tentacle Skull T-shirt
description: New t-shirt featuring the artwork from our new EP, single white print on black Gildan Heavy t-shirts. Artwork by Amy Edwards. Printed by Dirty Herd in Birmingham!
